pr_title: quest list: stop chat input from closing when pressing enter

timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -678,10 +683,10 @@ public void handleClick(MenuOptionClicked event)
 		}
 
 		if ((event.getWidgetId() == WidgetInfo.BANK_ITEM_CONTAINER.getId()

timeline.message: quest list: stop search input from closing when pressing enter

timeline.bodyText: this should get some documentation on what the return value is for
timeline.author: abextm

timeline.message: chatboxtextinput: conditionally close input from ondone callback
questlist, music, fairyring: don't close filter when pressing enter
